cause.description:
Music is the key to life. How do you think the world would be like today if we wouldn't have had music. This isn't a cause only for the people who love music, but for all people, because everyone likes music, maybe not the same sort of music, some like Rock, some like blues, other pop. But that is all music. And music can be a way to comunicat with people, it's a way to try and express a feeling. Music is important, all of it, eveyones type of music, it makes the world work.
1. Small bands should be able to get acces to. instruments for FREE
2. Small concerts must take place for small bands, or for a normal artist to get started.
3. Music should have the right to be about anything, no matter how horrible the lyrics might be.
cause.mission: Help people acheive life with their music
cause.name: Music makes the world go round
